00022 class fiche_def_ref 
00023 {
00024   var $frd_id;      // fiche_def_ref.frd_id
00025   var $frd_text;      // fiche_def_ref.frd_tex
00026   var $frd_class_base;      // fiche_def_ref.frd_class_base
00027   var $attribut;            // array which containing list of attr.
00028                             // it is used with dynamic variables
00029   function fiche_def_ref($p_cn,$p_frd_id=-1)
00030     {
00031       $this->db=$p_cn;
00032       $this->frd_id=$p_frd_id;
00033       $this->attribut=array('frd_id','frd_text','frd_class_base');
00034     }
00035 /* function LoadAll
00036  **************************************************
00037  * Purpose : Load all the fiche_def_ref data and
00038  *           return an array of  fiche_def_ref objects
00039  *        
00040  * parm : 
00041  *      - none
00042  * gen :
00043  *      - none
00044  * return: array
00045  */
00046   function LoadAll()
00047     {
00048       $sql="select * from fiche_def_ref order by frd_id";
00049       $Res=ExecSql($this->db,$sql);
00050       $all=pg_fetch_all($Res);
00051       if ( $Res == false ) return array();
00052       $idx=0;
00053       $array=array();
00054       foreach ($all as $row) 
00055         {
00056           $o=new fiche_def_ref($this->db);
00057 
00058           foreach (  $this->attribut as  $value)
00059             {
00060               $o->$value=$row[$value];
00061             }
00062           $array[$idx]=$o;
00063           $idx++;
00064         }
00065       return $array;
00066     }
00067 /* function Display
00068  **************************************************
00069  * Purpose : Display data between <TD> tag
00070  *        
00071  * parm : 
00072  *      - none
00073  * gen :
00074  *      -
00075  * return: string
00076  */
00077   function Display() 
00078     {
00079       $r="";
00080       foreach ( $this->attribut as $value) 
00081         {
00082           $r.="<TD>".$this->$value.'</TD>';
00083         }
00084       return $r;
00085     }
00086 /* function Input
00087  **************************************************
00088  * Purpose : Input Data between <td> tag
00089  *        
00090  * parm : 
00091  *      - none
00092  * gen :
00093  *      -
00094  * return: string
00095  */
00096   function Input()
00097     {
00098       $r="";
00099       $h=new widget('hidden');
00100       $r.='<li>Id          :'.$h->IOValue('frd_id',$this->frd_id).$this->frd_id."</li>";
00101       $w=new widget("text");
00102       $r.='<li>Commentaire  :'.$w->IOValue('frd_text',$this->frd_text)."</li>";
00103       $t=new widget('text');
00104       $r.='<li>Poste de base:'.$t->IOValue('frd_class_base',$this->frd_class_base)."</li>";
00105 
00106       return $r;
00107     }
00108 /* function Save
00109  **************************************************
00110  * Purpose : Store data into the database: update the 
00111  *           record
00112  *        
00113  * parm : 
00114  *      - none
00115  * gen :
00116  *      -
00117  * return: none
00118  */
00119   function Save()
00120     {
00121       $sql="update fiche_def_ref set frd_text='".
00122         $this->frd_text."' ,  frd_class_base='".$this->frd_class_base."'".
00123         " where frd_id=".$this->frd_id;
00124       $Res=ExecSql($this->db,$sql);
00125     }
00126 /* function Get
00127  **************************************************
00128  * Purpose : Get the data with the p_code and complete
00129  *           the current object
00130  *        
00131  * parm : 
00132  *      - none
00133  * gen :
00134  *      -
00135  * return: none
00136  */
00137   function Get()
00138     {
00139       $sql="select * from  fiche_def_ref ".
00140         " where frd_id=".$this->frd_id;
00141       $Res=ExecSql($this->db,$sql);
00142       if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0 ) return null;
00143       $r=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00144       $this->frd_text=$r['frd_text'];
00145       $this->frd_class_base=$r['frd_class_base'];
00146     }
00147 
00148 }
